title: 51. The Esthetician's Guide to Sponsorships + Red flags in Brand Deals.
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode I'm spilling the tea on sponsorships + red flags in brand deals... Aka how to avoid getting taken advantage of while creating content. 

If you haven't listened to estheticians are already influencers, I recommend starting with this episode first.


Thank you to today's sponsors:

Onaxa (Create your own professional skincare brand)

Use code Tessaskin15 for worth 15% off plus free shipping within The United States!

Sign up with Pomp for professional virtual skincare, or shop curated professional skincare
